title: Bots ruin the aram games
body: I don't know why just recently start to have a lot of bots in aram games. It is unacceptalbe. These fucking bots are ruin all my interests to keep playing this game. Good job, Riot, you are sucessful to make people far away the league. Bye

replies.body: Ye I played 2 games today, 50% bots. I logged out too! Over it.

> [{quoted}](name=PrIncESsnEveRsAd,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GnTLQ68t,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-12-09T15:48:33.442+0000)
>
> I don&#039;t know why just recently start to have a lot of bots in aram games. It is unacceptalbe. These fucking bots are ruin all my interests to keep playing this game. Good job, Riot, you are sucessful to make people far away the league. Bye

+1

Me and my somewhat 30 friends(theyve been active for years, me for months only) are seriously thinking of just uninstalling... so many bots... and its only during the nightime(euw) so its nothing about elo like the last guy(bottom-post) said. And trust me, i play waaay 2 much ARAM ^^ so i would have broken any "glass-ceiling´s" a long time ago. Lvl 70+ ffs haha, still unranked.
have a nice one ya´ll
League is dying. And riot's strategies are quickening the death.
Its all good, i played few games with 9 bots, at first I wasnt sure if that kalista was a bot because it was just soo op... the second game with it I decided it was a bot just too op thats all

I only play ARAM, and I seldom see bots.

ARAM has it's own ELO, and you see lots of bots because yours is low.

I have around 7500 ARAM's played, so I escape the bots.

If you are new to ARAM, you'll get the bot trash, just win some games and break the glass ceiling.

FFS, I have been matched against master and challenger (above diamond 1) many times, and I'm unranked 4 life. Is that fair on a scrub like me? Hell yeah it is, I'll get my ass kicked, but it's a lesson.

You don't get better by kicking puppies, you get better by wrestling bears.
